name: The Night's Genocide
description:
The Night's Genocide is a mini-game where you have to kill as many people as possible before you reach the end.

You play as a murderer who has been given the mission to kill a whole town,they decide to do so during a night at a restaurant where all of the townspeople are present.When they find out about the killer's plan,they will try to escape from the restaurant by using a hidden exit located behind the restaurant,unfortunately for them,the killer was waiting for them behind the restaurant,and they will slaughter as many people as they can before they escape.
